funding-group.funding-statement: Funding has been provided by the National Key Research and Development Program of China (2016YFA0600104), http://www.most.gov.cn/; Health industry research special funds for public welfare projects (201502020), http://www.nhfpc.gov.cn/; the National Natural Science Foundation of China (81673234, 41271099), http://www.nsfc.gov.cn/; Ministry of Science and Technology, China, the National Research Program (2012CB955501, 2012AA12A407), http://www.most.gov.cn/; Shaanxi Provincial Projects for Serious Disease Prevention and Control (0617-15240415), http://www.sxcdc.com/; and the Science and Technology Project of Shaanxi Province (2014A7, 2013K12-04-02), http://www.sxcdc.com/. The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
